title: Skills
introHard: The hard skills listed here were developed through years of training and practice. My expertise covers a variety of programming languages, frameworks, and tools used in software development and data analysis. I actively apply my knowledge to create innovative solutions, ensuring efficiency and reliability of projects, while achieving high results.
introSoft: Soft skills play a crucial role in my professional competence, enabling me to interact effectively with colleagues and adapt to changing conditions. I know how to organize my work, show initiative, and collaborate in teams. These qualities help me find optimal solutions in complex situations and contribute to team success.

hardSkills.name: Python
hardSkills.description: Over 5 years of experience developing scripts and web applications using Python. This includes working with libraries for data analysis, machine learning, and artificial intelligence: Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch. Experienced in applying these tools for big data analysis and AI model development.
hardSkills.example: In projects, I used Pandas and NumPy for data processing, and created machine learning models with Scikit-learn and TensorFlow for data classification and forecasting.

hardSkills.name: Django and PostgreSQL
hardSkills.description: Developed web applications using Django, integrated with PostgreSQL for user data management and complex queries. Configured server-side for optimal data processing.
hardSkills.example: I developed a responsive website for Eurasie en Analyse with user registration and feedback capability.

hardSkills.name: Data Science
hardSkills.description: Applied Data Science tools for data analysis and visualization with Matplotlib and Seaborn, as well as creating machine learning models. Used Jupyter Notebooks to create interactive reports and conduct experiments.
hardSkills.example: Developed data analyses and visualizations based on real data using Seaborn to identify hidden trends.

hardSkills.name: Machine Learning & Computer Vision
hardSkills.description: Experience working with AI and computer vision, including creating neural networks and training models using TensorFlow, PyTorch, and image processing with OpenCV.
hardSkills.example: Developed an image analysis system using OpenCV to improve data visualization and automatic object classification.

hardSkills.name: Git, Postman, Virtualenv, VS Code, Sublime Text
hardSkills.description: Used these tools for project management, coding, and testing, ensuring secure and comfortable development.
hardSkills.example: I use Git for version control to track changes and coordinate team work. Postman was helpful for testing APIs in projects.

hardSkills.name: Blockchain & Natural Language Processing (NLP)
hardSkills.description: Experience working with blockchain technologies and natural language processing. Applied NLP models for text analysis and created blockchain-based solutions for secure data exchange.
hardSkills.example: In the Paris-Saclay project, I implemented data routing based on a P2P protocol using blockchain to enhance security.
